formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'WaitForNoise' =-
[Synopsis] Waits for a specified amount of noise
[Description] WaitForNoise(noiserequired[,iterations][,timeout]) Wait for Noise: The same as Wait for Silance but waits for noise that is above the threshold specified

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
